mapper.insert: insert into fmeditem (id, ItemCode, ItemName, Format, Price, ExpClassID, DeptId, DelMark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{itemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expclassid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update fmeditem set ItemCode = #{itemcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ItemName = #{itemname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Format = #{format,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ExpClassID = #{expclassid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DeptId = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DelMark = #{delmark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, ItemCode, ItemName, Format, Price, ExpClassID, DeptId, DelMark from fmeditem
